description:
Beautifully updated to bring stylish move-in comfort and intelligently designed to make the most of the glorious tree-filled surroundings, this beautiful family residence is a haven you'd love to come home to. Spaced over multiple levels with a focus on connected relaxation, there is also easy access to amenities and a brilliant sense of tranquility throughout.

Features Include:
- Renovated family home in picturesque tree-filled setting
- Open-plan living and dining with high raked ceilings and wood burning fireplace
- Upgraded kitchen with tremendous storage, stainless appliances and centre island
- Huge covered rear deck with tree-filled outlook
- Two massive multi-purpose rooms with contemporary fit-out and large study zone
- Four built-in bedrooms; master including patio access
- Two renovated bathrooms with floor to ceiling tiling and black fixtures
- Large laundry/garden shed/plantation shutters/driveway parking
- Close to bus, parkland, shops, schools, dining and rail

An unassuming street frontage hides the glorious treasures you'll discover from the moment you enter. High raked ceilings amplify the space within a large open-plan zone with timber-styled floors and plantation shutters bringing classic sophistication. Warmed by the wood-burning fireplace, the large lounge flows to an open-plan dining and massive kitchen with a footprint and fit-out ideal for catering. Stylishly upgraded, there is an abundance of storage alongside tiled splash back, black fixtures and expansive bench space including a handy centre island; the monochrome aesthetic perfect for timeless appeal.

Bi-fold doors guide you outdoors to a massive deck, gloriously unfolding amongst mature trees for an air of relaxation akin to a treetop retreat. There is wonderful space to host family and friends with tremendous coverage from the elements.

Ideally flexible for a range of uses, the lower level encompasses two huge multi-purpose rooms, both freshly styled. There is a large study zone and upgraded bathroom with floor to ceiling tiling and black fixtures whilst a built-in bedroom and private deck enhance options to utilise the zone for multi-generational living if desired.

Upstairs three additional bedrooms include built-in storage with a family bathroom immaculately appointed and boasting a contemporary fit-out with floor to ceiling tiling, stone vanity and separate bath. Additional features include a large laundry, garden shed, front patio, double carport and additional driveway parking.

With all the ambiance of acreage-styled living, you also benefit from excellent access to amenities with bus at your door and a plethora of walking/bike tracks winding throughout the suburb. Centrally positioned, there are shops, schools and dining in almost every direction and train stations at hand for easy commuting!

Location Snapshot:
- 40m bus stop
- 1.2km Arana Plaza
- 1.5km Patricks Road State School
- 2km Ferny Grove train station

Arana Hills Information:
Located conveniently just 11km to Brisbane CBD, Arana Hills blends easy family-friendly suburban living without losing fantastic access to modern lifestyle perks. Arana Plaza is the major shopping centre for the 'hills district' home to K-Mart, Coles & Aldi. You'll also find a number of major banks, restaurants, take away stores and doctors within this shopping district & the popular Arana Leagues Club servicing the area.
